sourcesContent:
<template>
    <ion-app>
        <ion-header translucent>
            <ion-toolbar>
                <ion-title>iBuy</ion-title>
            </ion-toolbar>

        </ion-header>
        <ion-content fullscreen>
            <ion-searchbar placeholder="Escreva sua lista"><ion-icon name="add-outline"></ion-icon></ion-searchbar>
            <ion-checkbox color="tertiary" slot="start"></ion-checkbox>

        </ion-content>
        <ion-item>
            <ion-label>Cersei Lannister</ion-label>
        </ion-item>
    </ion-app>
</template>

<script>
import { IonSearchbar, IonApp, IonHeader, IonToolbar, IonContent, IonInput, IonIcon, IonCheckbox, IonLabel, IonItem } from '@ionic/vue';
import { defineComponent } from 'vue';

export default defineComponent({
    name: 'InsertItems',
    components: { 
        IonSearchbar,  IonApp, IonHeader, IonToolbar, IonContent, IonInput, IonIcon, IonCheckbox, IonLabel, IonItem 
    },

    methods: {
        /*insertItems(){

        }*/


        handleInput(event) {
            const searchbar = document.querySelector('ion-searchbar')
            const items = Array.from(document.querySelector('ion-list').children)
            searchbar.addEventListener('ionInput', handleInput)

            const query = event.target.value.toLowerCase()
            requestAnimationFrame(() => {
            items.forEach((item) => {
                const shouldShow = item.textContent.toLowerCase().indexOf(query) > -1;
                item.style.display = shouldShow ? 'block' : 'none';
            });
            });
        }
    },
});


</script>

<style>
    ion-searchbar{
       --border-radius: 20px;
    }
    
</style>
